  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.scene.generic.AbstractGenericRenderable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, Renderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:

extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable

      • setGpuShaderProgram

        public void setGpuShaderProgram(GpuShaderProgram prog)
        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        Sets the shader-program the render-system must use to draw this renderable.

        Note that renderables cannot be processed unless it has an associated shader-program.

        Specified by:
        setGpuShaderProgram in interface Renderable
        Parameters:
        prog - The shader-program.

        Returns:

      • setRenderState

        public void setRenderState(RenderState state)
        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        Sets a render-state that will be applied to the render-system before attempting to render this renderable.

        A single renderable can have multiple render-states simultaneously, as long as they're of different types. Setting a different instance of the same type causes the previous instance to be disposed and overwritten/replaced.

        Note that renderables may not be rendered correctly unless an appropriate render-state has been added.

        Specified by:
        setRenderState in interface Renderable
        Parameters:
        state - The render-state to be added or replaced.

      • getRenderState

        public RenderState getRenderState(RenderState.Type type)
        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        Gets a render-state of the specified type, if one has already been set. Otherwise null.

        It's the client's responsibility to cast the returned instance into the proper type, if necessary.

        Specified by:
        getRenderState in interface Renderable
        Parameters:
        type - The type.
        Returns:
        The render-state, if one is found. Otherwise null.

      • getRenderStates

        public java.lang.Iterable<RenderState> getRenderStates()
        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        Allows clients to iterate over all the render-states that have been added to this.
        Specified by:
        getRenderStates in interface Renderable
        Returns:
        An iterable of render-states.

      • notifyDispose

        public void notifyDispose()
        Description copied from interface: Disposable
        Explicitly releases the internal resources held by this instance, making it unusable afterwards.

        WARNING: This method is meant to be used internally by the framework and not by game clients. Use directly only if you really know what you're doing.

        Specified by:
        notifyDispose in interface Disposable
